verses.verse: But now thus says <WH559> Yahweh <WH3068> who created <WH1254> you, <WH3290> Jacob, and he who formed <WH3335> you, <WH3478> Israel: "Don't <WH3372> be afraid, for I have redeemed <WH1350> you. <WH7121> I have called you by your name. <WH8034> You are mine.

When you pass through <WH5674> the waters, <WH4325> I will be with you; <WH5674> and through the rivers, <WH5104> they will not overflow <WH7857> you. <WH3212> When you walk through <WH1119> the fire, <WH784> you will not be burned, <WH3554> and flame will not scorch you. <WH3852>

For I am Yahweh <WH3068> your God, <WH430> the Holy One <WH6918> of Israel, <WH3478> your Savior. <WH3467> I have given <WH5414> Egypt <WH4714> as your ransom, <WH3724> Ethiopia <WH3568> and Seba in your place. <WH5434>

Since you have been precious <WH3365> and honored <WH3513> in my sight, <WH5869> and I have loved <WH157> you; <WH5414> therefore I will give people <WH120> in your place, <WH3816> and nations instead of your life. <WH5315>
Don't <WH3372> be afraid; for I am with you. <WH935> I will bring your seed <WH2233> from the east, <WH4217> and gather <WH6908> you from the west. <WH4628>

I will tell <WH559> the north, <WH6828> <WH5414> 'Give them up!' and tell the south, <WH8486> <WH3607> 'Don't hold them back! Bring <WH935> my sons <WH1121> from far, <WH7350> and my daughters <WH1323> from the ends <WH7097> of the earth <WH776>â€”
everyone <WH3605> who is called <WH7121> by my name, <WH8034> and whom I have created <WH1254> for my glory, <WH3519> whom I have formed, <WH3335> yes, <WH6213> whom I have made.'"
Bring out <WH3318> the blind <WH5787> people <WH5971> who have <WH3426> eyes, <WH5869> and the deaf <WH2795> who have ears. <WH241>

Let all the nations <WH1471> be gathered <WH6908> together, <WH3162> and let the peoples <WH3816> be assembled. <WH622> Who among them can declare <WH5046> this, <WH8085> and show us former things? <WH7223> Let them bring <WH5414> their witnesses, <WH5707> that they may be justified; <WH6663> or let them hear, <WH8085> and say, <WH559> "That is true. <WH571>"

"You are my witnesses, <WH5707>" says <WH5002> Yahweh, <WH3068> "With my servant <WH5650> whom I have chosen; <WH977> that you may know <WH3045> and believe <WH539> me, <WH995> and understand that I am he. <WH6440> Before me there was no God <WH410> formed, <WH3335> neither will there be after me. <WH310>
I myself am Yahweh; <WH3068> and besides <WH1107> me there is no savior. <WH3467>

I have declared, <WH5046> I have saved, <WH3467> and I have shown; <WH8085> and there was no strange <WH2114> god among you. <WH5707> Therefore you are my witnesses," says <WH5002> Yahweh, <WH3068> "and I am God. <WH410>
Yes, <WH3117> since the day was I am he; <WH5337> and there is no one who can deliver out of my hand. <WH3027> I will work, <WH6466> and who can hinder it? <WH7725>"

Thus says <WH559> Yahweh, <WH3068> your Redeemer, <WH1350> the Holy One <WH6918> of Israel: <WH3478> "For your sake, <WH7971> I have sent to Babylon, <WH894> and I will bring all of them <WH1281> down <WH3381> as fugitives, <WH3778> even the Chaldeans, in the ships <WH591> of their rejoicing. <WH7440>
I am Yahweh, <WH3068> your Holy One, <WH6918> the Creator <WH1254> of Israel, <WH3478> your King. <WH4428>"
Thus says <WH559> Yahweh, <WH3068> who makes <WH5414> a way <WH1870> in the sea, <WH3220> and a path <WH5410> in the mighty <WH5794> waters; <WH4325>

who brings forth <WH3318> the chariot <WH7393> and horse, <WH5483> the army <WH2428> and the mighty <WH5808> man <WH7901> (they lie down together, <WH3162> they shall not rise; <WH6965> they are extinct, <WH1846> they are quenched <WH3518> like a wick <WH6594>):
"Don't <WH2142> remember the former things, <WH7223> and don't <WH995> consider the things of old. <WH6931>

Behold, <WH6213> I will do a new thing. <WH2319> It springs forth <WH6779> now. <WH3045> Don't you know it? <WH7760> I will even make a way <WH1870> in the wilderness, <WH4057> and rivers <WH5104> in the desert. <WH3452>

The animals <WH2416> of the field <WH7704> shall honor <WH3513> me, <WH8577> the jackals and the ostriches; <WH1323> because I give <WH5414> water <WH4325> in the wilderness <WH4057> and rivers <WH5104> in the desert, <WH3452> to give drink <WH8248> to my people, <WH5971> my chosen, <WH972>
the <WH2098> people <WH5971> which I formed <WH3335> for myself, <WH5608> that they might set forth my praise. <WH8416>
Yet you have not called <WH7121> on me, <WH3290> Jacob; but you have been weary <WH3021> of me, <WH3478> Israel.

You have not brought <WH935> me of your sheep <WH7716> for burnt offerings; <WH5930> neither have you honored <WH3513> me with your sacrifices. <WH2077> I have not burdened <WH5647> you with offerings, <WH4503> nor wearied <WH3021> you with frankincense. <WH3828>

You have bought <WH7069> me no sweet cane <WH7070> with money, <WH3701> nor have you filled <WH7301> me with the fat <WH2459> of your sacrifices; <WH2077> but you have burdened <WH5647> me with your sins. <WH2403> You have wearied <WH3021> me with your iniquities. <WH5771>
I, <WH4229> even I, am he who blots out your transgressions <WH6588> for my own sake; <WH2142> and I will not remember your sins. <WH2403>
Put me in remembrance. <WH2142> Let us plead <WH8199> together. <WH3162> Set forth <WH5608> your case, <WH6663> that you may be justified.
Your first <WH7223> father <WH1> sinned, <WH2398> and your teachers <WH3887> have transgressed against me. <WH6586>
Therefore I will profane <WH2490> the princes <WH8269> of the sanctuary; <WH6944> and I will make <WH5414> Jacob <WH3290> a curse, <WH2764> and Israel <WH3478> an insult. <WH1421>"
